page.title: 06 WEIGHTWISE GYMNASIUM
page.content:
{Weightwise Gym}was opened on 30th January 1984.To begin with the Gym did very well with an amazing 100 members.Members pay Â£150 a year.Now the number of members is 200,50 of whom are women. The people that organise the Gym are {Mr & Mrs Bevan}_ a husband and wife partnership.Weightwise is open every day ;from 10a.m. until 10p.m. Mondays to Fridays,and 8a.m. until 4p.m. on Saturdays and until noon on Sundays. About half of the Gym's members are bodybuilders.Most of the members enter competitions,and some of them win medals and trophies.According to Mrs Bevan,the fittest is {Mr Phil Waddman} who has won three trophies.
Christopher Angulo.
